channel.title: No-ip problem. Js5connect error
channel.description: ok, so heres what i do. Turn on no-ip, then i check mark my adress, then i compile server, and run it. It doesn't have an ipchanger, but in the client file on the client, i put 0.0.0.0. Then i try to connect and it doesn't work. Now if i turn off no-ip, it works! and i connect. But my brother on another laptop. He has the same client, and sets the ip in the client spot, but it doesn't work for him. He gets the same error. Because i turned the no-ip off. So how do i make it so i can put on my certian ip adress, but if i do that, i can't play on my own laptop. But if i don't turn it on, my bro can't play. WTF!

item.title: No-ip problem. Js5connect error
item.dc:creator: @imants100 imants100
item.description:
@imants100 wrote:

ok, so heres what i do. Turn on no-ip, then i check mark my adress, then i compile server, and run it. It doesn’t have an ipchanger, but in the client file on the client, i put 0.0.0.0. Then i try to connect and it doesn’t work. Now if i turn off no-ip, it works! and i connect. But my brother on another laptop. He has the same client, and sets the ip in the client spot, but it doesn’t work for him. He gets the same error. Because i turned the no-ip off. So how do i make it so i can put on my certian ip adress, but if i do that, i can’t play on my own laptop. But if i don’t turn it on, my bro can’t play. WTF!

Read full topic
